title: Womens Dress Short Sleeve
title_original: SOLY HUX Women's Short Sleeve Sweater 3D Floral Sweaters Pullover Tank Tops Knit Vest Trendy Fashion Clothing

specs.Best Sellers Rank: #11,574 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ( See Top 100 in Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry ) #184 in Women's Pullover Sweaters

category: Clothing, Shoes & Jewelry > Women > Clothing > Sweaters > Pullovers

reviews.customers_say: Customers find the sweater visually appealing, comparing it to Anthropologie and appreciating its unique flower pattern.

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pretty sweater
items.body: Love this sweater Great color and true to size Quality is so good Read more
items.author: SHEFALI RAMBEAU

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great product
items.body: Cute design, and great quality! The perfect thickness for a sweater — you could layer if you want while also wearing it on its own! Washes well and fits true to size! Read more
items.author: Alaina Yeater

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Very cute.
items.body: Very cute. A little itchy on the neck, but won't stop me from wearing it. Thinking about getting it in another color. I ordered a medium which is my usual size and it fit well. Just nicely oversized, not too big. I'm short (5') and the length wasn't too long. Material seems good. Read more
items.author: golfgirl

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Nice sweater, love the detail
items.body: Super cute. I’m ordering another color. Nice material and I love the subtle detail. The fit was accurate, what I usually wear. I’m going to be careful washing or only dry clean. Read more
items.author: Stephanie Richardson

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars It’s very short
items.body: Cute concept however these sleeves don’t suit every body type. I feel like I look giant and bulky. Also, the cut is very short. A sweater should def be longer Read more
items.author: AC

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Better in person than in pictures!
items.body: Beautiful Mediterranean blue (not Navy). Very soft feel and comfortable fit. The flower pattern is unique and feminine without being frilly. I expected less and was pleasantly surprised at the quality, fit, and feel of this piece. Great “light-weight” fall sweater. Read more
items.author: Customer

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars Cheap look
items.body: It looks cheap and the material is cheap Read more
items.author: paulo

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Cute sweater
items.body: Very cute! The first day I wore it I gave the link to 4 people! Quality is great. Washed well. Sizing is good. Read more
items.author: K Sto

short_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

long_description:
Womens Dress Short Sleeve is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: XS, S, M, L, XL.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Black Striped, Black Floral, Green Black Floral, Grey Floral, Olive Green, Dark Grey, Dusty Pink, Army Green, Black, Dark Grey Hearts, White Floral, Dusty Blue, Dusty Blue Floral, Plain Apricot. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
